item.description: Meet other local Hand-Drummers who are interested creating community through the rich history of Africa and it's people. Drum Circles are a great way to stay connected to our inner rhythms.
item.how_to_find_us: "We'll welcome you at the door! And make sure you are comfortable. We'll also make sure you have a professional drum to play, for FREE!"
item.why: With our deep connections to Guinea, where the djembe and most of the drum circle rhythms come from, you will not ony have a blast, but we will share our love of rhythm in a traditional way.
item.name: The Arlington Drum Circle June Meeting
